meanings.definition: The quality or ability of being able to be packed.
meanings.sent1: The packability of the suitcase made it easy to fit all my clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The packability of the boxes allowed for efficient storage in the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: I never knew the packability of a backpack could bring so much joy until I tried to fit all my snacks inside.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a packability that could rival even the most skilled Tetris player.
meanings.sent5: The packability of the sleeping bag was so impressive that it could be compressed into a tiny pouch.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being suitable for packing.
meanings.sent1: The packability of the fabric made it ideal for shipping delicate items.
meanings.sent2: When considering the packability of the materials, we chose the ones that could be easily transported.
meanings.sent3: The packability of the gift box was so perfect that it seemed to wrap itself up.
meanings.sent4: The packability of her emotions was like trying to fit a whole circus into a small suitcase.
meanings.sent5: The packability of the picnic basket was so convenient that we could bring everything we needed for a day out.
